name: 谢拉·贝尔夏
birth_place: 加拿大,安大略省,卡普斯卡辛
introduction: » Born and raised in Kapuskasing, Ontario (same hometown as Avatar & Titanic director James Cameron)» Moved to Toronto at age 18 to pursue modeling» Live with my two cats Arthur & Rufus, and dwarf rabbit Ziggy. Looking forward to having a big house one day so I can have two dogs as well – a Dachshund and a Doberman.» Love to travel. Have been to London, Paris, New York, Los Angeles, Strasbourg, Lille, Austin, Aruba, Tulum, Antigua, St. Martin, St. Lucia, Cuba, but my favourite places so far were Annecy (France) and Cahuita (Cost Rica). Would love to go to Germany and Newfoundland soon.» Favourite Foods – Sushi (especially Eel, Giant Clam, And Raw Scallop), Spaghetti and Meatballs, Alsace Onion Tart, and a nice thick organic Steak.» Favourite TV shows – Seinfeld, Curb Your Enthusiasm, Dexter, Desperate Housewives, and any of the BBC Nature series (Life, Earth, etc.)» Favourite Movies – Water Lilies, Blue Velvet, Lord of the Rings trilogy, Bad Lieutenant (the original with Harvey Keitel), Gangs of New York, Elf.» Favourite Music – I like everything from Vitalic and Boys Noize, to Death Cab for Cutie and Ron Sexsmith, to Shania Twain and Travis Tritt, to Roy Orbison.» Biggest Pet Peeve – people mistaking my shyness for snobbery…Where I want to be…» In 5 years – still modeling and acting.» In 15 years – running my own perfume line (I studied perfumery in Paris).» In 30 years – running a little bed and breakfast in Costa Rica.
